definition: see 杳無音信|杳无音信[yao3 wu2 yin1 xin4]
to disappear/to vanish/to eliminate/to spend (time)/have to/need
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: After, during 3 years, we didn't do anything, as if nothing ever happened that winter.
sentences.chinese: 此後3年內杳無消息，就像什麼都不曾發生過。
